definition: saving a life is more meritorious than building a seven-floor pagoda (idiom)
pinyin: jiu4 ren2 yi1 ming4 sheng4 zao4 qi1 ji2 fu2 tu2
containing_words.word: 救人一命胜造七级浮屠

definition: Buddha/Buddhist stupa (transliteration of Pali thupo)/also written 浮屠
stupa/tower venerating the ashes of the Buddha
Mt Meru or Sumeru, sacred mountain in Buddhist and Jain tradition/Mt Xumi in Guyuan 固原[Gu4 yuan2], Ningxia, with many Buddhist cave statues
(Buddhism) to deliver all living creatures from suffering (idiom)
Buddhist ornamentation decorating the upper story of a pagoda
Buddha-like heart (full of compassion)/spirit of Buddha (awakened to reality and no longer clinging to appearances)
Guanyin, the Bodhisattva of Compassion or Goddess of Mercy (Sanskrit Avalokiteśvara)
Leifeng Pagoda, by West Lake until it was destroyed (also from Madam White Snake)
Amitabha Buddha/the Buddha of the Western paradise/may the lord Buddha preserve us!/merciful Buddha!
